[{"id":"JT-47150","entityId":"25-1983313","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47150"},{"name":"summary","value":"Change label "No value" to "No value (required field)" in administrative UI if field cannot be empty"},{"name":"description","value":"

And add warning at the bottom of the form in case of private or conditional field (describing potential problems).

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1525956372617,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2862039","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-47150","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Scott Adams could you please provide wording for such warning: if field is required and private then users without update private fields or read private fields permissions are not allowed to create issue (it is recommended to set default value for this case)

{"id":"JT-47124","entityId":"25-1981527","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47124"},{"name":"summary","value":"Download problem after authorization token timeout"},{"name":"description","value":"

If you leave opened tab with ticket for longer time and you then want to download a file from the ticket, chrome says "download failed" but the file is downloaded with fixed context (example in the attachments). If you do refresh (F5) and download file it is downloaded properly.

It looks the download link doesn't refresh oauth2 token automatically and you need to do it manually with F5.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525786908517"},{"name":"updated","value":"1525937212355"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"jk"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Evgeny Naumenko"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"l0coful"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Łukasz Frankowski"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"2"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"maksimrv","fullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Authentication"],"valueId":["Authentication"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Affected versions","value":["2018.1"],"valueId":["2018.1"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 66","id":"YouTrack:sprint 66"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"test.graphml","id":"74-522227","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/test.graphml?file=74-522227&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2861460","author":"jk","authorFullName":"Evgeny Naumenko","issueId":"JT-47124","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
